```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
m <- sample(10:99, 1) # kg
ang <- sample(10:80, 1) # angle (deg)

ans <- 9.8 * sin(ang * pi / 180) # acceleration (m/s^2)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = 0.1, format = FALSE, digits = 1)
sc$questions <- sprintf("\\SI{%.1f}{m/s^2}", sc$questions)
```

Question
========
A box of mass $`r m`$ kg slides down a frictionless inclined plane. The angle 
of incline is $`r ang`^\circ$ from the horizontal. What is the acceleration of the box?


```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```


Solution
========
The acceleration is
$$a = g \sin\theta = (\SI{9.8}{m/s^2}) \sin(`r ang`^\circ) = \SI{`r fmt(ans, 1)`}{m/s^2}$$
